p.codeblock: public abstract int enableExtension(String provider, String extension, boolean enable);
virtual int enableExtension( const char* provider, const char* extension, bool enable=true, agora::media::MEDIA_SOURCE_TYPE type = agora::media::UNKNOWN_MEDIA_SOURCE) = 0;
abstract enableExtension(provider: string, extension: string, enable?: boolean, type?: MediaSourceType): number;
public abstract int EnableExtension(string provider, string extension, bool enable = true, MEDIA_SOURCE_TYPE type = MEDIA_SOURCE_TYPE.UNKNOWN_MEDIA_SOURCE);
Future<void> enableExtension( {required String provider, required String extension, bool enable = true, MediaSourceType type = MediaSourceType.unknownMediaSource});

section.p: Ensure that you call this method before joining a channel.

ul.li: If you want to enable multiple extensions, you need to call this method multiple times.
The data processing order of different extensions in the SDK is determined by the order in which the extensions are enabled. That is, the extension that is enabled first will process the data first.

pt.props: android cpp unity rn electron flutter

pd.p:
Whether to enable the extension:
: Enable the extension.
: Disable the extension.

plentry.pd:
Type of media source. See . In this method, this parameter supports only the following two settings:
The default value is .
If you want to use the second camera to capture video, set this parameter to .
